channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Security Supporter

item.title: CVE-2022-28778|2024-08-03T06:03:52.605Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20security%20supporter
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Security Supporter prior to version 1.2.40.0 allows attacker to set the arbitrary folder as Secret Folder without Samsung Security Supporter permission
